item.title: 会计师事务所违规后壳牌将更新美国重要财务文件

item.description: "壳牌指出："2023 年和 2024 年的财务报表保持不变。【原文：“The financial statements for 2023 and 2024 remain unchanged,” Shell notes, after accounting firm Ernst & Young advised that its audits did not comply with US Securities and Exchange Commission rules】

item.title: 巨型浮筒正在运往巴西的途中，标志着价值 23 亿美元项目的重要里程碑
